name: Grapple & Sneeze
description:
This is a project made in 2 months, Your objective is to grapple to the other side in order to get a tissue to sneeze safely and not spread the Cobit Virus. You have many abilities such as Slow Motion if you press F and the Grappling Gun which is the main ability that you will use in order to win.

Show me your skills, and comment your best time.
